org.datasift
Class Definition

java.lang.Object
  org.datasift.Definition

public class Definition
extends java.lang.Object

The DataSift_Definition class represents a stream definition.

getHash

public java.lang.String getHash()
                         throws EInvalidData,
                                EAccessDenied
Returns the hash for this definition. If the hash has not yet been obtained it compiles the definition first.

Returns:
String The hash.
Throws:
EInvalidData
JSONException
EAccessDenied

clearHash

protected void clearHash()
Reset the hash to false. The effect of this is to make the definition as requiring compilation.

             throws EInvalidData,

getPushSubscriptions

public java.util.ArrayList<PushSubscription> getPushSubscriptions()
                                                           throws EInvalidData,
                                                                  EAPIError,
                                                                  EAccessDenied
Get a list of push subscriptions for this definition. Limited to 100 results.Results will be returned in ascending order by creation date.

Returns:
ArrayList
Throws:
EInvalidData
EAPIError
EAccessDenied

getPushSubscriptions

public java.util.ArrayList<PushSubscription> getPushSubscriptions(int page)
                                                           throws EInvalidData,
                                                                  EAPIError,
                                                                  EAccessDenied
Get a page of push subscriptions for this definition, where each page contains up to 20 items. Results will be returned in ascending order by creation date.

Parameters:
User - user The user.
int - page The page number to fetch.
Returns:
ArrayList
Throws:
EInvalidData
EAPIError
EAccessDenied

getPushSubscriptions

public java.util.ArrayList<PushSubscription> getPushSubscriptions(int page,
                                                                  int per_page)
                                                           throws EInvalidData,
                                                                  EAPIError,
                                                                  EAccessDenied
Get a page of push subscriptions for this definition, where each page contains up to per_page items. Results will be returned in ascending order by creation date.

Parameters:
User - user The user.
int - page The page number to fetch.
int - per_page The number of items per page.
Returns:
ArrayList
Throws:
EInvalidData
EAPIError
EAccessDenied

getPushSubscriptions

public java.util.ArrayList<PushSubscription> getPushSubscriptions(int page,
                                                                  int per_page,
                                                                  java.lang.String order_by,
                                                                  java.lang.String order_dir)
                                                           throws EInvalidData,
                                                                  EAPIError,
                                                                  EAccessDenied
Get a page of push subscriptions for this definition, where each page contains up to per_page items. Results will be ordered according to the supplied ordering parameters.

Parameters:
User - user The user.
int - page The page number to fetch.
int - per_page The number of items per page.
String - order_by The field on which to order the results.
String - order_dir The direction of the ordering.
boolean - include_finished True to include subscriptions against finished historic queries.
Returns:
ArrayList
Throws:
EInvalidData
EAPIError
EAccessDenied

getBuffered

public java.util.List<Interaction> getBuffered(int count,
                                               java.lang.String fromid)
                                        throws EInvalidData,
                                               EAccessDenied,
                                               ECompileFailed,
                                               EAPIError
Get a list of interactions available for the currently set hash

Parameters:
count - Max interactions to return (if set to -1 then all available interactions in the buffer are retrieved)
fromid - The interaction id to start from, if set to null then all available interactions in the buffer are retrieved
Returns:
Throws:
EInvalidData
EAccessDenied
ECompileFailed
EAPIError
